Package gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.adapters

Interface Summary
AnyOperation<A,R> AnyOperation is an generic adapter interface.
AnyOperationSpec Specification for a simple operation.
Flag Flag is an adapter interface for any class that has an operation that returns a boolean value.
Modification<T> Modification on an object.
VoidOperation<A> VoidOperation is a generic adapter interface for any void operation that can be applied to an object.
 

Class Summary
AdvancedFilter<T,R> Filters object against a condition.
AnyOperationSpecImpl Simple implementation of AnyOperationSpec.
CalculatePercentageWithFixedRounding<T> CalculatePercentageWithFixedRounding calculates a property of an object by applying a percentage to another property of the object.
CollectionToArray<T> Transforms a list to an array.
ConditionAdapter<T> Adapter for a Condition.
CopyFromBeans<T> Modifies an object by setting its properties equal to the values of the respective properties of a number of supplied beans.
The beans are specified in the constructor.
CopyFromMap<T> Modifies an object by setting its properties equal to the values specified in a Map object.
CopyFromProperties<T> Modifies an object by setting its properties equal to the values specified in a Properties object.
Create<A,R> Creates a new instance of R by calling its constructor that takes an argument of type A.
Filter<T> Filters object against a condition.
GetProperties Extracts properties of an object to an array of objects.
GetProperty<A,R> Applies a property getter.
GetRangeFromProperties<T,P extends Comparable<? super P>> Creates a range defined by two properties of an object.
GetTheSame<T> Implementation of AnyOperation that returns the same input object.
MultipleStepsCreate<A,R> Creates an object in multiple steps by using a series of Create adapters.
NumberConverter Number converter.
PeriodicCommand PeriodicCommand turns the behavior of a SimpleCommand to periodic.
PropertyValuesChecker<T> Compares for equality property values of an object, against an array of predefined values, and returns a list that contains a predefined message for each property that was equal to the predefined value.
PropertyValuesNotNullChecker<T> PropertyValuesChecker that checks that the specified properties are not null.
Refresh<T extends Refreshable> Refreshes a Refreshable object.
ReplaceWith<T> Modification that checks if the specified value is equal to the value specified in the constructor as replace and if so, it replaces it with the value specified in the constructor as with.
Sequence<A,R> Sequential operation.
SingleSubjectOperation<T> SingleSubjectOperation adapts a VoidOperation to a SimpleCommand by executing the VoidOperation to a predefined subject.
ToString
